body:
- Fixed Pie- & DonutChart height property.
- make flowLayout auto-responsive behavior a bit smarter
- fix: eliminating the duplication of toast messages
- Fixed number of small issues: Colorpicker now gets correct initial value, Options in Select now get correct keys, removed Tabs tabTemplate prop because of a bigger bug.
- Changed open in new window button tooltip label for all occurrences.
- Fixed NavLink label break if overflowing available space.
- new form properties: onSuccess, inProgressNotificationMessage, completedNotificationMessage, errorNotificationMessage
- default style tweaks
- feat: xmlui-devtools - start dialog animation from the click, use exit animation as well
- Add AppWithCodeView component to display code and running app side-by-side

- Allow turning on/off heading anchors in appGlobals
- wip: code inspector buttons - label change, devtools - animation update

- The Footer component no provides a themeable gap between its children.
- feat: NestedApp works with ApiInterceptor
- fix NestedApp apiUrl overwrite
- feat: xmlui-devtools - use it in a modal dialog
- fix: Table columns do not allow (and indicate) sorting when bindTo is not set
- change default borderColor
- fix table styling
- Default theme variables changed for App, NestedApp, TableOfContents, and Text
- enhance xmlui parser error tolerance, recovering from unclosed tags
- merge xmlui-charts into core

- Added theme variable for setting the horizontal alignment of the logo in the NavPanel.
- Moved Drawer logo position to left.
- fix: Slider - min/max value validation
- fix: Markdown renders inline/block images correclty

- standalone usage: explicit codeBehind reference
- Make the "marked" Text variant have lighter background color in dark mode.
- Tweaked Search dropdown panel styles. Corrected Link component text and decoration hover and active colors
